wikipedia_page.main: Amanda Kelly is a Scottish female kickboxer and mixed martial artist, based in London. She has competed professionally since 2005 and is currently in the Cage Warriors Bantamweight division. Trained in Muay Thai for 5 years due to her upright stance compared to other in her training group.

response: * Amanda Kelly (born 1982), Scottish kickboxer and mixed martial artist

link_mentions.page: List of female mixed martial artists

response: Her last fight was in Los Angeles, California against British fighter Amanda Kelly on 12 January 2012. She lost via split decision after five rounds. She officially retired later that month.
